title: How to Freeze Nuts

steps.headline: Select the nuts.
steps.description: They can be raw, toasted, roasted, or ground. If you've just freshly cracked nuts, this is a great way to ensure that they keep their freshness.

steps.headline: Place the nuts into an airtight (tightly covered) container.
steps.description: Alternatively, place them into sealable plastic bags that wrap them well.

steps.headline: Place in the freezer.
steps.description: The nuts can keep this way for up to one year.

steps.headline: Thaw.
